WRITING.TEXT:
These are some interesting questions I actually didn't think about.
The bouncer interpreted the painting in his own way, but it is still very vauge what message the artist, Martha, wanted the send. All she said is that she wanted to get "reactions". But for what intentions?
Why was it so important to emphasize on the fact that the bouncer is BIG, and all he has is muscles? Is the author trying to say that you can't judge people by their appearance?
thank you for the answer btw. You made me think

WRITING.TITLE: should I join Hellfire or wargate?
WRITING.TEXT:
So I've been very interested into playing some "tbc" and these two servers seem to be the most popular at the moment, looking at this subreddit (except warmane's Outland who's going beta testing tomorrow?).
which one is recommended for someone who's into pvp? All I've seen in this subreddit is 50/50 where some people say wargate is scumbags, and some people say hellfire is scumbags. all I want is high pop server with pvp oriented people and alot of activity.
which one? :) thank you :D 3

I do have to say that "project-ascension" is a VERY promising pvp oriented vanilla server BUT with a twist. The twist is that YOU make your own class.. You have the ability to mix spells from every class in the game and make your unique character. There Will be THREE different servers from soft-core to hardcore server. In hardcore server it is FFS (free for all) Where everyone can kill You. This forces you to join groups, guilds etc to survive. Other than that, the server is pretty blizzlike where You raid, bgs, arena and stuff.
It is still in beta but I do have to say that this is the most fun I've had in any private server for sure! I've been playing all night this saturday instead of actually Going out with friends. You should definitely try it out dude. Its soo much fun.
This video is helpful: https://youtu.be/3_D7D-a1omI

WRITING.TITLE: Noob needs help for pure !
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey! So last time I played RS is when I was very young and now I'm 19 and felt the nostalgia which made me play again (but this time I know what I'm doing). I have started a pure and currently my stats are :
Attack: 41 (Goal: 60) Strength: 42 ( Goal: 99) Prayer: 18 (Goal : 52) Defence: 1 (Goal: 1) Ranged: 1 (Goal: 99) Magic:1 (Goal 99)
But here's the problem! I don't understand how to level up RANGE and MAGIC since so many people are telling me different things. People tell me that I made a mistake since I need to level up RANGE and MAGIC first because otherwise they will raise my combat level?
Can someone tell me just how I should do? Is there a special method I need to follow when leveling RANGE and MAGIC to not contribute to Combat level? Some people even tell me to level range with a Cannon so I don't get combat level.. but some people say that is a bad method since I wont get any hitpoints. Some people even tell me that I shouldn't level RANGE and MAGIC at all because that is not a PURE. my head is spinning....
so please, can someone confirm for me how I can level magic and range the right way?

Oh yes. Thank you for the links! I think I need to do both of these things. I need to stay in training mode for a while, because I feel like I'm geting matched with people that ARE much more competentet than Me.

Thank You for the advice! Well, that's the problem. I need to learn WHEN to actually use such things.
But when people say combo. Does it need to invigde a special attack to be a combo?

Oh thank you! I almost forget about such things that You mentioned, that I need to be more passive aggressive and "poke", as I always find Myself either too aggressive Or too defensive.
So basically I need to play ALOT of games to figure out which attacks can be linked into specials

Oh thank you! I almost forget about such things that You mentioned, that I need to be more passive aggressive and "poke", as I always find Myself either too aggressive Or too defensive.
So basically I need to play ALOT of games to figure out which attacks can be linked into specials

So basically, I have to play ALOT so I can over time recognize these block-strings.

I have no problem with ryu since I already have memorized all his special attacks that is mentioned in the game already, But still dont know IF guile is a good char.
Thank You for your advice Btw 3
Oh wow. I'll try to check that out. The target combo. Because as I Said, either I just spam every special I have memorized, Or I feel like I'm Button mashing every normal attack on the controller.
Oh Thank You ! This community seems so delight. I'll check the book out. I'm kinda overwhelmed of all the information I recentley got, But its so worth it

Thank You! Well, the thing, I've been very very interested into "guile" even though I've seen ALOT of people advice against him since he is now top tier and is also very hard to learn the game with.. so basically "ryu" would be optimal for me..

WRITING.TITLE: Do I even need farm/land? - pvper?
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys. straight to the point : As a new player who only played until level 30 when the game came out.. I'm now waiting for the fresh start servers.. All I wanna do is basically PVP, PVP and once again : PVP

Because I see these threads about people terrified and are worried about something called "16x16" land and landrushes blablabla.. Is this necessary to obtain the best gear? to actually farm and obtain land? or is there other methods to achieve good gear to eventually PVP all day long.
I'm sorry if this question was stupid.. but I still want to know if this farming thingy VERY important for END content.
